properties.entry: SELECT GAME_NO , COMPANY_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , TO_CHAR(RELEASE_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') "RELEASE_DATE" , PRICE , POINT , GAME_STATUS , GAME_IMG FROM GAME WHERE KOR_NAME || ENG_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT GAME_NO , COMPANY_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , TO_CHAR(RELEASE_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') "RELEASE_DATE" , PRICE , GAME_INTRO , CONFIRM , UPGAME , UPLOAD_DATE , POINT , GAME_STATUS , GAME_IMG FROM GAME WHERE GAME_NO = ?
SELECT CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_STATUS FROM CATEGORY

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT G.GAME_NO "GAME_NO" , C.COMPANY_NAME "COMPANY_NAME" , G.ENG_NAME "ENG_NAME" , TO_CHAR(G.UPLOAD_DATE, '""YYYY"-"MM"-"DD""') "UPLOAD_DATE" FROM GAME G INNER JOIN COMPANY C ON G.COMPANY_NO = C.COMPANY_NO WHERE G.GAME_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY G.GAME_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM GAME WHERE GAME_STATUS = 'Y'
